SELECT username `username`, password `password`, email `email` FROM USER WHERE 1=1
AND username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{username}), '%')
AND email like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{email}), '%')
AND password like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{password}), '%')
GROUP BY username
